name: Jeremy's Idea of Capitalism
description:
Game made in 8 days for Juice Jam! No webgl build because we're using FMOD.

Turns out breaking all possible human laws may come with a surprise visit from the IRS and Jeremy is about to experience that first hand.

Credits:

Arcy - Programming, Sound Design, Game Design, 2D Art

Yollie - Programming, 3D Art, Game Design

Music: Neutron by Irishtoner

Additional 3D Assets: Kenney

Linux and Mac versions are untested and may require giving execution perms!
Example on Mac: chmod -R 755 /Path/to/BuildMac.app
